name: LCSAssetDownload
description: Task to download assets from the LCS asset library
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: Review the Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations [Developer Documentation](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141867).

inputs.name: serviceConnectionName
inputs.label: LCS Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Dynamics Lifecycle Services connection to be used

inputs.name: projectId
inputs.label: LCS Project Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Project Id of the Dynamics Lifecycle Services project to download from

inputs.name: assetPath
inputs.label: Path to download to
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder path where to download the file asset to

inputs.name: searchPattern
inputs.label: Search Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Find the assets to download by asset ID or by name

inputs.name: fileAssetId
inputs.label: LCS File Asset Id(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: One or more Asset Ids, separated by semi-colon (;), of the assets in the Dynamics Lifecycle Services Asset Library

inputs.name: fileAssetType
inputs.label: LCS File Asset Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of asset to search for

inputs.name: fileAssetName
inputs.label: LCS File Asset Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the asset(s) in the Dynamics Lifecycle Services Asset Library, wildcards (*) can be used.

OutputVariables.name: FilePath
OutputVariables.description: Output variable containing one or more full file path, separated by semi-colon (;), of the downloaded asset(s)
